  proposition: xGen-MM (BLIP-3) is a family of open large multimodal models published in an arXiv preprint in 2024.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    xGen-MM (BLIP-3)|PUBLISHED_IN|arXiv

    entity-entity relationships:
    
  proposition: Dongxu Li, Junnan Li, and Steven Hoi published a paper on BLIP-Diffusion for controllable text-to-image generation and editing in Advances in Neural Information Processing Systems in 2024.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    BLIP-Diffusion|PUBLISHED_IN|Advances in Neural Information Processing Systems
    BLIP-Diffusion|PUBLICATION_YEAR|2024
    BLIP-Diffusion|DESCRIBED_BY|controllable

    entity-entity relationships:
    Dongxu Li|AUTHOR_OF|BLIP-Diffusion
    Junnan Li|AUTHOR_OF|BLIP-Diffusion

  proposition: Can Qin and colleagues published a paper on UniControl, a unified diffusion model for controllable visual generation, in an arXiv preprint in 2023.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    UniControl|PUBLISHED_IN|arXiv
    UniControl|PUBLICATION_YEAR|2023
    UniControl|DESCRIBED_BY|unified
    UniControl|DESCRIBED_BY|diffusion
    UniControl|DESCRIBED_BY|controllable
    UniControl|DESCRIBED_BY|visual

    entity-entity relationships:
    Can Qin|AUTHOR_OF|UniControl

  proposition: Tom Gunter and colleagues published a paper on Apple Intelligence Foundation Language Models in an arXiv preprint in 2024.
